George Soros or György Schwartz (1930-), Hungarian American financial speculator and millionaire philanthropist

sentences.english: So when George Soros talks currencies, people listen.
sentences.chinese: 因此，当乔治索罗斯会谈货币时，人们奉若神牌。

sentences.english: Addario is also a recipient of the Soros Foundation Grant.
sentences.chinese: 阿黛瑞尔目前还是索罗斯基金的赞助对象。

sentences.english: You write as if you and Soros have been playing roulette.
sentences.chinese: 你写得就好像你和索罗斯是在玩儿轮盘赌一样。

sentences.english: Soros credits the anti-globalisation movement for having made companies more sensitive to their wider responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 索罗斯赞扬反全球化运动使各公司认识到更的责任。
